alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 6:54PM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .Rainfall totaling 2 to 4 inches is expected over the Tombigbee River basin through early Friday morning. A flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River for anticipated water rises. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 39.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue rising to 69.4 feet Monday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
